title: Authors and Citation
text: Andrew B. Collier. Maintainer, copyright holder. Andrew B. Collier. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Collier AB (2024). alpacar: wrapper Alpaca API. R package version 0.0.8, https://datawookie.github.io/alpacar/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {alpacar: A wrapper for the Alpaca API},   author = {Andrew B. Collier},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.8},   url = {https://datawookie.github.io/alpacar/}, }

what: A wrapper for the Alpaca API
title: A wrapper for the Alpaca API
text: alpacar R package wrapper Alpaca API. API documentation can found .

title: A wrapper for the Alpaca API
A wrapper for the Alpaca API
text: installed can load package. also like increase number significant figures tibble output (completely optional).

title: A wrapper for the Alpaca API
text: store credentials environment variables. Specifically use .env file project directory.
code: library(dotenv)  load_dot_env()  authenticate(   key = Sys.getenv("ALPACA_KEY"),   secret = Sys.getenv("ALPACA_SECRET_KEY") )

title: Get corporate actions. — actions
code: actions(   type = c("dividend", "merger", "spinoff", "split"),   since = NULL,   until = NULL )

title: Get corporate actions. — actions
text: type Types action. since Start date. End date. 90 days start date. dates, `` `since`, filter returned data according `payable_date` field.

title: Get corporate actions. — actions
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # By default retrieves all actions for last 90 days. actions() # Get only dividends for specific range of dates. actions("dividend", start="2024-07-01", until="2024-09-01") # Either date can be omitted, in which case get 90 days from/until date. actions("merger", start="2024-07-01") actions("spinoff", until="2024-09-01") } # }

what: Get assets available for trade and data. — assets_list
title: Get assets available for trade and data. — assets_list
Get assets available for trade and data. — assets_list
code: assets_list(   status = "active",   class = "us_equity",   exchange = NULL,   attributes = NULL )

title: Get assets available for trade and data. — assets_list
text: status Asset status (either `"active"`, `"inactive"` `NULL`). includes active assets default. class Asset class. option `"us_equity"`, default. exchange Exchange asset listed (one `"AMEX"`, `"ARCA"`, `"BATS"`, `"NASDAQ"`, `"NYSE"`, `"OTC"`). Include default. attributes vector attributes (one `"fractional_eh_enabled"`, `"has_options"`, `"options_late_close"`, `"ptp_no_exception"`, `"ptp_with_exception"`).

title: Get assets available for trade and data. — assets_list
Get assets available for trade and data. — assets_list

what: Set Alpaca REST API key & secret — authenticate
title: Set Alpaca REST API key & secret — authenticate
text: Set Alpaca REST API key & secret

title: Set Alpaca REST API key & secret — authenticate
Set Alpaca REST API key & secret — authenticate
text: key API key. secret API secret.

title: Set Alpaca REST API key & secret — authenticate
Get historic bars. — bars
code: bars(   symbols,   timeframe,   start = NA,   end = NA,   limit = 1000,   adjustment = "all" )

title: Get historic bars. — bars
text: symbols One symbols. timeframe Timeframe bars. Expressed various units: `Min` `T` minutes, `Hour` `H` hours, `Day` `D` days, `Week` `W` weeks `Month` `M` months. start Start date (YYYY-MM-DD). end End date (YYYY-MM-DD).

what: Set or query API base URL — base_url
title: Set or query API base URL — base_url
Set or query API base URL — base_url
Set or query API base URL — base_url
Set or query API base URL — base_url
Set or query API base URL — base_url
code: base_url() #> [1] "https://paper-api.alpaca.markets/v2/" # The live API. base_url("https://api.alpaca.markets") #> [1] "https://api.alpaca.markets/" # The paper-trading API. base_url("https://paper-api.alpaca.markets/v2") #> [1] "https://paper-api.alpaca.markets/v2/"

title: Get market clock information. — clock
text: - current market timestamp (`timestamp`), - whether market currently open (`is_open`), - times next market open (`next_open`) close (`next_close`).

title: Get options data. — options_list
code: options_list(   underlying_symbols,   type = NULL,   expiration_date_gte = NULL,   expiration_date_lte = NULL,   complete = FALSE )

title: Get options data. — options_list
text: type Filter contracts type (`"call"` `"put"`). expiration_date_gte Minimum expiration date. expiration_date_lte Maximum expiration date. default set next weekend. complete Whether retrieve complete chain future expiration dates.

title: Place an order. — order_create
code: order_create(symbol, side, quantity, type = "market", limit_price = NA)

what: Generic print() method for Alpaca Account objects. — print.alpacaAccount
title: Generic print() method for Alpaca Account objects. — print.alpacaAccount
text: Generic print() method Alpaca Account objects.

title: Generic print() method for Alpaca Account objects. — print.alpacaAccount
Generic print() method for Alpaca Account objects. — print.alpacaAccount
Generic print() method for Alpaca Account objects. — print.alpacaAccount

what: Get historic quotes for one or more stocks. — quotes_history
title: Get historic quotes for one or more stocks. — quotes_history
Get historic quotes for one or more stocks. — quotes_history
Get historic quotes for one or more stocks. — quotes_history
text: symbols One symbols. start Start date (YYYY-MM-DD YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ). end End date (YYYY-MM-DD YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).

title: Get historic quotes for one or more stocks. — quotes_history
Get historic quotes for one or more stocks. — quotes_history
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Quotes for current day (none if market not yet open). quotes <- quotes_history("AAPL") quotes_history(c("AAPL", "TSLA")) # Quotes for specific time period. quotes <- quotes_history("AAPL", "2024-08-01T09:00:00Z", "2024-08-01T09:05:00Z") } # }

what: Get latest quotes for one or more stocks. — quotes_latest
title: Get latest quotes for one or more stocks. — quotes_latest
Get latest quotes for one or more stocks. — quotes_latest
Get latest quotes for one or more stocks. — quotes_latest
Get latest quotes for one or more stocks. — quotes_latest
Get latest quotes for one or more stocks. — quotes_latest
Get trades. — trades
text: symbols One symbols. start Start date (YYYY-MM-DD). end End date (YYYY-MM-DD). feed Data source. Either `"sip"`, `"iex"` (default) `"otc"`.

title: Get watchlist by ID. — watchlist
text: id Watchlist ID. `assets` column list column containing data frame listing watched assets.

what: Add asset to watchlist by ID. — watchlist_add
title: Add asset to watchlist by ID. — watchlist_add
Add asset to watchlist by ID. — watchlist_add
Add asset to watchlist by ID. — watchlist_add
text: id Watchlist ID. symbol Asset symbol.

title: Add asset to watchlist by ID. — watchlist_add
